items.sentence: Tom took Mary\'s hands and brought them to his lips.
Let\'s talk about it while we drink a cup of coffee.
Mary is the only woman that I\'ve ever really loved.
It took me three hours to drive from Boston to here.
We have to finish everything before Tuesday morning.
Tom made himself a peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
Tom played an old Irish song on his new French horn.
What kind of food did you eat when you were a child?
What makes one person more intelligent than another?
When I lived in Boston, I rode my bicycle every day.
